task.title: Audio & Visual
task.shortdesc: This section will outline the best practices for implementing solid audio and visual techniques when creating your Instructional video.

step.cmd: Make the Rhetorical Sructure Visible & Persistent - Ensure that any breaks between objectives are properly titled and disttinctively convert to your next segment.
Test the Timing of your Audio/Video - Ensure that the audio and video you are creating is cohesive and competent. Audio should slightly precede the video.
Editing for a final Product - Use the recording and editing tools at your disposal in your creator. Viewers will notice small inconsistencies in your video unless properly edited and refined.
Rehearse your Script - Ensure that you are comfortable reading the script you have prepared and can recite it in a strong effective tone.
